Subject: Arjuna Award
data: 1 In which year the Arjuna Awards were instituted ? A 1956 B 1961 C 1964 D 1967 Answer: Option [B]
2 The Arjuna Awards are given to recognize outstanding achievements in which of the following categories ? A Music B Leadership C Sports D Social work Answer: Option [C]
3 Cricketer Rohit Sharma is awareded with the Arjuna Award in the year : A 2012 B 2013 C 2014 D 2015 Answer: Option [D]
4 The Arjuna Award winner Abhijeet Gupta is related to which of the following sports ? A Tennis B Kabaddi C Chess D Wrestling Answer: Option [C]
5 The Arjuna Award winner Sreejesh Ravindran is related to : A Hockey B Gymnastics C Football D Golf Answer: Option [A]
